Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy | Family | Lifestyle | Romance/Dating

Network: HBO ( USA)

Created by and starring Lena Dunham ("Tiny Furniture"), the show is a comic look at the assorted humiliations and rare triumphs of a group of girls in their early 20s. (Source: HBO)
